QAPair.Question: What is (are) Pin care ?
QAPair.Answer: Broken bones can be fixed in surgery with metal pins, screws, nails, rods, or plates. These metal pieces hold the bones in place while they heal. Sometimes, the metal pins need to stick out of your skin to hold the broken bone in place. The metal and the skin around the pin must stay clean to prevent infection.
